Package com.w10.risk_game.models

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.models.Phase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GamePlayPhase, MapEditorPhase
    public abstract class Phase
extends Object
    The `Phase` class is an abstract class that represents a phase in a Risk game and provides methods for various game commands.
    Author:
    Omnia Alam, Sherwyn Dsouza

      • addCountry

        public abstract void addCountry​(int p_countryId,
                                String p_countryName,
                                String p_continentName)
        The function adds a country to a collection with the specified country ID, country name, and continent name.
        Parameters:
        p_countryId - The unique identifier for the country.
        p_countryName - The name of the country you want to add.
        p_continentName - The parameter "p_continentName" is a String that represents the name of the continent to which the country belongs.

        p_bonus - The p_bonus parameter represents the bonus value associated with the continent.

        p_countryId - The ID of the country to which you want to add a neighbor.
        p_neighborCountryId - The ID of the neighboring country that you want to add.

        Parameters:
        p_countryId - The ID of the country from which you want to remove a neighbor.
        p_neighborCountryId - The ID of the neighbor country that you want to remove from the list of neighbors for the specified country.
